entry.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Trailer (Nickelodeon Reboot)

media:group.media:title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Trailer (Nickelodeon Reboot)
media:group.media:description: Nickelodeon has released the first trailer for Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The revamped TMNT series will debut later this year, and features the vocal talents of Omar Miller (Ballers) as Raphael, Ben Schwartz (Parks and Recreation) as Leonardo, Josh Brener (Silicon Valley) as Donatello, Brandon Mychal Smith (You're The Worst) as Michelangelo, Kat Graham (The Vampire Diaries) as April O'Neil and Eric Bauza (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles) as Splinter. WWE Superstar John Cena lends his voice as villain Baron Draxum, an alchemist warrior mutant who seeks to turn all of humanity into mutants.
